newsitem.title: USA: Mylex sees Q2 results below expectations.
newsitem.headline: Mylex sees Q2 results below expectations.

text.p: Mylex Corp said Wednesday it expects to report a net loss of $0.05 to $0.08 per share in the second quarter, and sees sales about 25 percent under the first quarter's $35.9 million.
The earnings forecast compares with analyst expectations for a $0.14 per share profit, according to First Call.
The company said it appears that a fall off in European sales toward the end of the quarter and weakness in the server market have contributed significantly to the shortfall.
It added that demand for Mylex products in the Asia-Pacific market was stronger than anticipated during the quarter.
